__e: I no longer understand the world.
Yes, they love each other, so they do the same thing for each other.
But people are what they are and love what they love, and i don't see any sense in trying to be something else.
Women like you love for what they can get out of it But you'll get nothing from me!
I love you as men love all that is worst for them.
For instance, why should people who love the country have to live in big cities?
But if you love adventure and like liberty, there is nothing better for you than to take to the sea life.
We have one group of people with energy with faith who love life like their work, we believe we can make work different with our great efforts.
Finding people who love the same stuff you do is super easy and fast with millions of people to discover.
You kids love each other very much, don't you?
But don't forget, no matter what your problem is your dad and Uncle Jesse and Joey are always on your side because they love you very much.
They love you, and they need you.
FOR THOSE WHO LOVE THE DETAILS
Why do parents love any kid?
Don't you think they love their daddies just as much as you do?
They love you so much you go right into a hospital.
I mean, I don't love you like they love you...
He says you don't have any friends and that you know two kinds of people:
